issue.title: knowtechie.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://knowtechie.com/can-the-playstation-5-play-dvd-movies/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fknowtechie.com%2Fcan-the-playstation-5-play-dvd-movies%2F) ### Comment > Leftover ads, please add more appropriate blocking rules. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/5d5346e02x440ogwcgsskc04wocggo0d3pukr8fzvk.jpg?nc=1)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/6twpqea0k30o0ccsgwcs0gcgkss48w4374azq2cit4.jpg?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard Browser Extension v5.2.113.0 MV2 System version: | `Android 15` Browser: | Firefox Mobile Tracking protection: | **General settings**:
Block trackers,
Strip URLs from tracking parameters,
Hide your search queries,
Send Do-Not-Track header

**Tracking methods**:
Self-destructing third-party cookies (10)

**Browser API**:
Block WebRTC Filters: | Ad blocking:
AdGuard Base,
AdGuard Mobile Ads,
EasyList

Privacy:
AdGuard Tracking Protection,
AdGuard URL Tracking,
EasyPrivacy,
Peter Lowe's Blocklist,
Fanboy's Anti-Facebook List,
Legitimate URL Shortener

Security:
Online Malicious URL Blocklist,
Phishing URL Blocklist,
Scam Blocklist by DurableNapkin,
uBlock Origin – Badware risks

Other:
Filter unblocking search ads and self-promotion

Language-specific:
AdGuard Japanese,
AdGuard Spanish/Portuguese,
AdGuard Chinese Filters last update: | November 30, 2025 at 12:28 Browsing Security: | enabled Browsing Security statistics: | disabled Other extensions used: | `AdNauseum, ClearURL, Dark Reader, Decentraleyes, Indie Wiki Buddy, Violentmonkey, uBlacklist` ### Issue configuration [Import](https://reports.adguard.com/settings/import.html?product_type=ext&product_version=5.2.113.0&system_version=Android+15&manifest_version=2&browser=firefox+mobile&filters=2.3.7.9.10.11.17.101.118.204.208.224.225.251.255.256.257&browsing_security.enabled=true&browsing_security.statistics_enabled=false&stealth.enabled=true&stealth.webrtc=true&stealth.strip_url=true&stealth.hide_search_queries=true&stealth.DNT=true&stealth.third_party_cookies=10&stealth.block_trackers=true&filters_last_update=2025-11-30T12%3A28%3A09)

issue.body:
